languages.text: "Сбои в работе различных механизмов. В воздуховоды периодически попадают вещества, которых там быть не должно. Ауспексы фиксируют всплески различных излучений. Отключаются системы обслуживания без видимых причин. Это похоже на эксперименты по уничтожению, в которых ваши слуги — подопытные".

"Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."
languages.original_text: "Сбои в работе различных механизмов. В воздуховоды периодически попадают вещества, которых там быть не должно. Ауспексы фиксируют всплески различных излучений. Отключаются системы обслуживания без видимых причин. Это похоже на эксперименты по уничтожению, в которых ваши слуги — подопытные".

traits.locale_text: "The mountain terrain analysis systems have detected radiation that had never been detected by the equipment before. According to reports, one of the oldest mines of the world had recently reached a deep level, where some sort of anomaly was noted... And after that, strange things have started happening on Vheabos-VI."

"The mountain terrain analysis systems have detected radiation that had never been detected by the equipment before. According to reports, one of the oldest mines of the world had recently reached a deep level, where some sort of anomaly was noted... And after that, strange things have started happening on Vheabos-VI."

"Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

"Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

"Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

languages.text: “各种各样的机械故障，比如通风系统会释放出本不该存在的物质，光谱显示出高度辐射，维护系统无故宕机。这一切看起来就像是个灭绝实验，而你的臣民成为了实验对象。”
languages.original_text: "Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

traits.locale_text: “各种各样的机械故障，比如通风系统会释放出本不该存在的物质，光谱显示出高度辐射，维护系统无故宕机。这一切看起来就像是个灭绝实验，而你的臣民成为了实验对象。”

languages.text: «Diversos tipos de fallos mecánicos: Sistemas de ventilación que emiten sustancias que no deberían estar ahí. Aúspex que registran picos de radiación. Sistemas de mantenimiento apagados sin razón aparente. Todo se asemeja a experimentos de exterminio, con sus sirvientes jugando el papel de ratones de laboratorio».
languages.original_text: "Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

traits.locale_text: «Diversos tipos de fallos mecánicos: Sistemas de ventilación que emiten sustancias que no deberían estar ahí. Aúspex que registran picos de radiación. Sistemas de mantenimiento apagados sin razón aparente. Todo se asemeja a experimentos de exterminio, con sus sirvientes jugando el papel de ratones de laboratorio».

languages.text: 「さまざまな機械的故障が起こっている。換気システムが、そこには必要のない物質を排出しているし、アウスペクスが放射線の急上昇を記録している。メンテナンス・システムは、明白な理由もなくシャットダウンした。このすべてがまるで絶滅実験のようだ。アンタの従者たちが被験者になっているぞ」
languages.original_text: "Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

traits.locale_text: 「さまざまな機械的故障が起こっている。換気システムが、そこには必要のない物質を排出しているし、アウスペクスが放射線の急上昇を記録している。メンテナンス・システムは、明白な理由もなくシャットダウンした。このすべてがまるで絶滅実験のようだ。アンタの従者たちが被験者になっているぞ」

languages.text: « Divers types de pannes mécaniques. Des systèmes de ventilation émettant des substances qui n'ont rien à y faire, des auspex enregistrant des pics de radiations, des systèmes de maintenance s'arrêtant sans raison apparente... Tout cela ressemble à des expériences d'extermination dont les cobayes sont vos sujets. »
languages.original_text: "Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

traits.locale_text: « Divers types de pannes mécaniques. Des systèmes de ventilation émettant des substances qui n'ont rien à y faire, des auspex enregistrant des pics de radiations, des systèmes de maintenance s'arrêtant sans raison apparente... Tout cela ressemble à des expériences d'extermination dont les cobayes sont vos sujets. »

languages.text: "Verschiedene mechanische Fehlfunktionen. Lüftungssysteme, die Substanzen versprühen, die darin nichts zu suchen haben. Auspizien, die Strahlungsspitzen registrieren. Wartungssysteme, die sich aus unbekannten Gründen abschalten. Es wirkt alles wie Neutralisierungsexperimente, und Eure Diener sind die Versuchskaninchen."
languages.original_text: "Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."

traits.locale_text: "Verschiedene mechanische Fehlfunktionen. Lüftungssysteme, die Substanzen versprühen, die darin nichts zu suchen haben. Auspizien, die Strahlungsspitzen registrieren. Wartungssysteme, die sich aus unbekannten Gründen abschalten. Es wirkt alles wie Neutralisierungsexperimente, und Eure Diener sind die Versuchskaninchen."

languages.text: "Çeşitli mekanik sorunlar, havalandırma sistemlerinin olmadık maddeler yayması, uzgörenlerin ani radyasyon artışları gözlemlemesi ve bakım sistemlerinin durduk yere kapanması gibi şeyler. Tüm bunlar, hizmetkârlarınızı kobay faresi yerine koyan kök kurutma deneylerini andırıyor."
languages.original_text: "Various sorts of mechanical failures. Ventilation systems emitting substances that have no business being there. Auspexes registering spikes of radiation. Maintenance systems shutting down for no apparent reason. It all resembles extermination experiments, with your servants playing the role of test subject."
